title: How to Polish Silverware
summary: Using banana peels to polish and clean silverware.
content: To polish silverware with banana peels, first remove any strings from the inside of the peel. Rub the inside of the banana peel over the tarnished silverware. The natural oils and enzymes in the banana peel will help to break down and lift the tarnish. After thoroughly rubbing, rinse the silverware with warm water and dry with a soft cloth. The silverware will be left shiny and clean.
